name: Cleanerbots
description:
Cleanerbots is a fast-paced, local multiplayer 2d platformer where you compete for a high score while avoiding dangers strewn around the levels.

How to Play

For best results use 2 controllers.

Player 1 Controls

WASD - Movement

Y - Jump

G - Throw

Player 2 Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement

Shift - Jump

Ctrl - Throw
